message: Hi Bob, I'm offering this product to you first at a price of $15,000. I believe it offers significant value, even beyond the asking price.
I'm interested in the product, but I think it's a bit pricey. I'm willing to pay $10,000 for it. Can you consider my offer?

Thanks for the offer, Bob. I understand your perspective on the price.  While I can't go as low as $10,000, I'm willing to come down to $13,500. I believe this reflects a fair value considering the product's worth.
I appreciate your willingness to come down on the price, but I'm still a bit above my budget. I'm willing to pay $11,500 for the product. Can you consider my offer?
